# Spinner

A simple loading spinner.

## Usage

```html
<bal-spinner></bal-spinner>
```

### Small

```html
<bal-spinner small></bal-spinner>
```

### Inverted

```html
<div class="has-background-info is-padded">
  <bal-spinner inverted></bal-spinner>
</div>
```
